EternalReroll.Name: Tome of Identify
EternalReroll.Tooltip:
Right click to identify an item
Selects top left items first
Not consumable
EternalReroll.TooltipTranslation:
鉴定物品栏第一个物品
无限使用

Selects top left items first

消耗品

Selects top left items first
Consumable
